briefTitle: Ultrasound Based Localization of Lumpectomy Bed in Anatomical Coordinate System
officialTitle: "Ultrasound Based Localization of Lumpectomy Bed in Anatomical Coordinate System" (J-0728)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Describe the concordance between the lumpectomy bed's center-of-mass (COM) as determined by USEI and CT
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with breast cancer, who are status post lumpectomy and are scheduled to have radiation therapy, will be eligible.
